description: Try our easy to follow Cream of Chicken Lasagne recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lasagne,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Mince,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Cream of Chicken Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840g Campbellâ€™s condensed cream of chicken soup

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a large, deep frying pan over high heat. Add mince and cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 4 minutes or until cooked through. Add soup, reserving one-quarter in a bowl. Bring to the boil.

Spoon 1/4 cup mince mixture over base of an 8-cup capacity baking dish. Top with one-third of the lasagne sheets, breaking to fit, if necessary. Top with one-third of the mince mixture. Repeat layering, finishing with remaining lasagne sheets. Add 1/2cup water to reserved soup and stir to combine. Pour over lasagne, then bake for 20 minutes or until lasagne sheets are tender.
Meanwhile, place salad mix in a bowl. Drizzle with remaining oil. Season with pepper. Toss gently to combine. Serve lasagne with salad.
